title: Blitzcrank Grab bug when snared by Lux
body:
I was playing a bot game as blitz, because it's fun hitting consistent hooks. The enemy support was a Lux, and, as I hit her with a Q, she snared me. My Q hit her and pulled her half-way to me, but she stopped moving when her snare hit me. 

A similar thing occurs if I pull a Malzahar while infected with Space Aids

I assume this is a bug, but am not sure if it is a bot-game-only bug, or if it can happen in any game.
